Class DatabaseStatistics

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Cleanup
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents comprehensive database statistics for monitoring and diagnostics. Provides metrics on articles, feeds, tags, and database file size.
